select TABLE_NAME as "name", TABLE_ROWS as "tableRows", CREATE_TIME as "createTime", UPDATE_TIME as "updateTime", TABLE_COMMENT as "comment" from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA='mysiteforme'
and TABLE_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{params.name}, '%')

select c.COLUMN_NAME as "name", c.ORDINAL_POSITION, c.IS_NULLABLE as "isNullValue", upper(c.DATA_TYPE) as "type", if(locate('(',c.COLUMN_TYPE)=0,null,substring_index(substring_index(c.COLUMN_TYPE,'(',-1),')',1)) as "length", c.COLUMN_COMMENT as "comment", d.id as "dictlist.id", d.type as "dictlist.type", d.label as "dictlist.label", d.value as "dictlist.value" FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Columns c left join (select * from sys_dict where parent_id = '0' and del_flag = false) d on d.type = CONCAT(c.TABLE_NAME,"_",c.COLUMN_NAME) where c.table_name=#{name} and c.table_schema='mysiteforme'
and COLUMN_NAME not in ('id','create_date','create_by','update_date','update_by','remarks','del_flag')
and COLUMN_NAME not in ('id','parent_id','parent_ids','level','sort', 'create_date','create_by','update_date','update_by','remarks','del_flag')
and COLUMN_NAME != 'id'
order by ORDINAL_POSITION
